Uses of Class
com.squareup.picasso.RequestCreator

    • Uses of RequestCreator in com.squareup.picasso

      Methods in com.squareup.picasso that return RequestCreator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RequestCreator RequestCreator.centerCrop()
      Crops an image inside of the bounds specified by resize(int, int) rather than distorting the aspect ratio.
      RequestCreator RequestCreator.centerInside()
      Centers an image inside of the bounds specified by resize(int, int).
      RequestCreator RequestCreator.config(android.graphics.Bitmap.Config config)
      Attempt to decode the image using the specified config.
      RequestCreator RequestCreator.error(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable errorDrawable)
      An error drawable to be used if the request image could not be loaded.
      RequestCreator RequestCreator.error(int errorResId)
      An error drawable to be used if the request image could not be loaded.
      RequestCreator RequestCreator.fit()
      Attempt to resize the image to fit exactly into the target ImageView's bounds.
      RequestCreator Picasso.load(java.io.File file)
      Start an image request using the specified image file.
      RequestCreator Picasso.load(int resourceId)
      Start an image request using the specified drawable resource ID.
      RequestCreator Picasso.load(java.lang.String path)
      Start an image request using the specified path.
      RequestCreator Picasso.load(android.net.Uri uri)
      Start an image request using the specified URI.
      RequestCreator RequestCreator.noFade()
      Disable brief fade in of images loaded from the disk cache or network.
      RequestCreator RequestCreator.placeholder(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable placeholderDrawable)
      A placeholder drawable to be used while the image is being loaded.
      RequestCreator RequestCreator.placeholder(int placeholderResId)
      A placeholder drawable to be used while the image is being loaded.
      RequestCreator RequestCreator.resize(int targetWidth, int targetHeight)
      Resize the image to the specified size in pixels.
      RequestCreator RequestCreator.resizeDimen(int targetWidthResId, int targetHeightResId)
      Resize the image to the specified dimension size.
      RequestCreator RequestCreator.rotate(float degrees)
      Rotate the image by the specified degrees.
      RequestCreator RequestCreator.rotate(float degrees, float pivotX, float pivotY)
      Rotate the image by the specified degrees around a pivot point.
      RequestCreator RequestCreator.skipMemoryCache()
      Indicate that this action should not use the memory cache for attempting to load or save the image.
      RequestCreator RequestCreator.transform(Transformation transformation)
      Add a custom transformation to be applied to the image.
